articles.title: Swans lose forward Isaac Heeney to injury and 'just went to sleep' as Essendon pile on five goals
articles.description: The Essendon Bombers are making a contest of their clash with the Sydney Swans, kicking five straight goals in the leadup to halftime to only trail by four points in their AFL clash at the MCG on Saturday
articles.content:
The Sydney Swans have taken a four-point lead into halftime of their AFL clash but they have plenty of worries with a forward on the bench and the Bombers closing fast.

articles.author: Nathan Johns
articles.title: Indian cricket team who played Ireland this week are heroes to a diaspora 8,000km from home
articles.description: While still a fringe sport in Ireland, cricket unites a large and disparate immigrant community here.
articles.content: No other sports team is as well supported away from home as the Indian cricket side. No matter where they go, Indian fans seem to at least match those of the host nation, if not outnumber them, as th… [+4519 chars]
